availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin Ruthven Ray (Hickman County, KY, Court clerk and attorney)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk. Hickman County, Kentucky, native. Son of Dennis Ray and Nancy Hays Ray. Married to Harriet M. Brown Ray on January 5, 1854. Father of Ruth M. Ray, Susan N. Ray, Annie I. Ray, and Willie E. Ray. Attorney in Hickman County in 1860. Clerk of the Hickman County Court in 1860. Clerk of the Hickman County Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 502.

Florida Death Certificates, 1877-1939, Bureau of Vital Statistics, Jacksonville, FL, File #3591.
History of Benton, Washington, Carroll, Madison, Crawford, Franklin, and Sebastian Counties, Arkansas, (Chicago: The Goodspeed Publishing Co., 1889), 1071-72 .
